modName: Markarth Horse Replacer - Dwarven Horse Bot
summary: This mod replaces the horse in Markarth with a dwarven horse bot. Simple as that, enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the horse in Markarth with a dwarven horse bot. Simple as that, enjoy.

Check out my other mods, on my mod page: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]
author: billmineface
